TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StringUtil extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides methods to support legacy string comparison methods.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
public static int Compare (string strA, string strB, bool ignoreCase);
.method public static hidebysig int32 Compare(string strA, string strB, bool ignoreCase) cil managed

Docs.param: if set to true, the case of the letters in the strings is ignored.
Docs.summary: Compares two strings for equality, ignoring case if requested.
Docs.returns: Zero if the strings are equivalent, a negative number if strA is sorted first, a positive number if strB is sorted first

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool StringsEqual (string strA, string strB, bool ignoreCase);
.method public static hidebysig bool StringsEqual(string strA, string strB, bool ignoreCase) cil managed

Docs.param: if set to true, the case of the letters in the strings is ignored.
Docs.summary: Compares two strings for equality, ignoring case if requested.
Docs.returns: True if the strings are equivalent, false if not.
